As to hepatitis C virus (HCV) infection, there is a well-established association between this condition and the development of lymphoma, with a reported risk 60% higher in HCV-infected individuals than in uninfected controls
8 . Diffuse large B-cell lymphoma (DLBCL), lymphoplasmacytic lymphoma and marginal zone lymphoma are the most commonly linked malignancies
9 .
